text: John Kevin Stitt (born December 28, 1972) is an American businessman, philanthropist and politician. He is a member of the Republican Party. Stitt is the 28th Governor of Oklahoma since 2019. He is the founder and Chairman of Gateway Mortgage Group. He grew up in Norman, Oklahoma and graduated from Oklahoma State University. He is a member of the Cherokee Nation. ==References== Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:American philanthropists Category:Businesspeople from Tulsa, Oklahoma Category:Governors of Oklahoma Category:People from Norman, Oklahoma Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Politicians from Tulsa, Oklahoma
title: Kevin Stitt
